## Kafu SDK License

Kafu SDK is licensed under either of:

- **MIT License**
- **Apache License, Version 2.0, with LLVM Exception**

at your option.

For the full license text, please see the [LICENSE](https://github.com/tamaroning/kafu/blob/main/LICENSE) file in the repository root.

## Binaries Generated by Kafu Clang

Binaries generated by Kafu Clang have **wasi-libc** statically linked.

When using, distributing, or modifying generated binaries, you must comply with the **wasi-libc license**. For detailed information and the full license text, please refer to the [WebAssembly / wasi-libc](https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-libc) repository.
